title: manchi paNadhiraa
sahitya:
manci paNadirA ninnu jUci marulu konnadirA mArubAri tALadurA cakkani sAmigAvurA



anupallavi



 panca bANa janaka shri padmanAbha dAsa vancipAla bAlarAma varma

 kulashEkhara kirITapati citrOdaya nrpEndra



caraNam



 rAja hamsa gamanirA nAduDani ninnu nammiyunnadirA purOvurA
